feature_defs.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack granted by Flurry of Blows
effects: Addle: the target can’t make opportunity attacks until the start of its next turn.
Push: the target must succeed on a Strength save or be pushed up to 15 feet away from you.
Topple: the target must succeed on a Dexterity save or be prone.
You regain hit points equal to your Martial Arts die + your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
limits: You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feature_defs.trigger: when you take a bonus action other than Step of the Wind
effects: You can use Step of the Wind immediately after that bonus action.

feature_defs.trigger: when you hit a creature with an unarmed strike
effects: You can expend 4 Focus Points to start imperceptible vibrations that last for a number of days equal to your monk level.
The vibrations are harmless unless you end them; to end them, you and the target must be on the same plane.
When you end the vibrations, the target makes a Constitution save; on a failed save it takes 10d12 force damage, or half as much on a success.
You can have only one creature affected at a time.
You can end the vibrations harmlessly (no action required).
